Text: Swiss mountain dog:  While the two larger ones share a heavy build and a calm temperament, the two smaller ones are more agile.

Text: Swiss mountain dog:  The name Sennenhund refers to people called "Senn" or Senner, Swiss alpine herdsmen and dairymen, and does not translate as "mountain" or "cattle".
